languages.text: "Преподобная Сесилия, наивернейшая слуга ваша. Родители заточили меня в монастырь за интерес к знаниям, что невежды зовут запретными. Но когда вы пришли к власти, я поняла, что все изменится. Я молилась вам, и вы ответили — послали людей на поиски истинно верующей души. Мне легко дались их испытания, ибо любая цена — тлен в сравнении с шансом лично служить вам".

"Confessor Cecilia, your most devoted servant. My parents threw me into a monastery for showing interest in knowledge that the ignorant see as forbidden. But when you came to power, I knew things were about to change. I prayed to you, and you answered when you sent your people to search for a truly pious soul. They tested me, but it was nothing, for any price is dust compared to the chance to serve you personally."
languages.original_text: "Преподобная Сесилия, наивернейшая слуга ваша. Родители заточили меня в монастырь за интерес к знаниям, что невежды зовут запретными. Но когда вы пришли к власти, я поняла, что все изменится. Я молилась вам, и вы ответили — послали людей на поиски истинно верующей души. Мне легко дались их испытания, ибо любая цена — тлен в сравнении с шансом лично служить вам".

languages.text: "Konfessorin Cecilia, Eure ergebenste Dienerin. Meine Eltern steckten mich in ein Kloster, weil ich mich für Wissen interessierte, das die Ignoranten für verboten halten. Aber als Ihr an die Macht kamt, wusste ich, dass sich einiges ändern würde. Ich habe zu Euch gebetet und Ihr habt geantwortet, indem Ihr Eure Leute mit der Suche nach einer wahrlich frommen Seele betraut habt. Sie haben mich getestet, aber das war nichts, denn jeder Preis ist Staub verglichen mit der Chance, Euch persönlich zu dienen."
languages.original_text: "Confessor Cecilia, your most devoted servant. My parents threw me into a monastery for showing interest in knowledge that the ignorant see as forbidden. But when you came to power, I knew things were about to change. I prayed to you, and you answered when you sent your people to search for a truly pious soul. They tested me, but it was nothing, for any price is dust compared to the chance to serve you personally."

Aber als Ihr an die Macht kamt, wusste ich, dass sich einiges ändern würde. Sie haben mich getestet, aber das war nichts, denn jeder Preis ist Staub verglichen mit der Chance, Euch persönlich zu dienen."

languages.text: « Confesseure Cécilia, votre servante la plus dévouée. Mes parents m'avaient envoyée dans un monastère parce que je montrais soi-disant trop d'intérêt pour des connaissances que les ignorants considèrent comme interdites. Mais quand vous êtes {mf|arrivé|arrivée} au pouvoir, j'ai tout de suite su que les choses allaient changer. J'ai prié pour vous, et vous avez répondu à mes prières en envoyant vos gens chercher une âme véritablement pieuse. Ils m'ont mise à l'épreuve, mais ce n'était rien pour moi, car avoir la chance de vous servir personnellement n'a pas de prix. »
languages.original_text: "Confessor Cecilia, your most devoted servant. My parents threw me into a monastery for showing interest in knowledge that the ignorant see as forbidden. But when you came to power, I knew things were about to change. I prayed to you, and you answered when you sent your people to search for a truly pious soul. They tested me, but it was nothing, for any price is dust compared to the chance to serve you personally."

traits.locale_text: « Révérende Cécilia, votre servante la plus dévouée. Mes parents m'avaient envoyée dans un monastère parce que je montrais soi-disant trop d'intérêt pour des connaissances que les ignorants considèrent comme interdites. Mais quand vous êtes {mf|arrivé|arrivée} au pouvoir, j'ai tout de suite su que les choses allaient changer. J'ai prié pour vous, et vous avez répondu à mes prières en envoyant vos gens chercher une âme véritablement pieuse. Ils m'ont mise à l'épreuve, mais ce n'était rien pour moi, car avoir la chance de vous servir personnellement n'a pas de prix. »

languages.text: «La confesora Cecilia, su sirvienta más devota. Mis padres me encerraron en un monasterio por interesarme por un conocimiento que los ignorantes consideran prohibido. Pero con su ascenso al poder, supe que las cosas cambiarían. Le recé y, cuando envió a su gente en busca de un alma piadosa, respondió a mis plegarias. Me pusieron a prueba, pero el precio que exigían era insignificante comparado con el poder servirle personalmente».
languages.original_text: "Confessor Cecilia, your most devoted servant. My parents threw me into a monastery for showing interest in knowledge that the ignorant see as forbidden. But when you came to power, I knew things were about to change. I prayed to you, and you answered when you sent your people to search for a truly pious soul. They tested me, but it was nothing, for any price is dust compared to the chance to serve you personally."

traits.locale_text: «La reverenda Cecilia, su sirvienta más devota. Mis padres me encerraron en un monasterio por interesarme por un conocimiento que los ignorantes consideran prohibido. Pero con su ascenso al poder, supe que las cosas cambiarían. Le recé y, cuando envió a su gente en busca de un alma piadosa, respondió a mis plegarias. Me pusieron a prueba, pero el precio que exigían era insignificante comparado con el poder servirle personalmente».

languages.text: 「聴罪師セシリア、あなたの最も敬虔な従者です。無知な者が禁忌とする知識に興味を示したことで、両親は私を修道院に入れました。ですがあなたが権力を握られた時、情勢が変わろうとしていると知りました。私はあなたに祈り、そしてあなたは真に敬虔な魂を探すべく部下を派遣する形で応えてくださいました。彼らは私を試しましたが、そんなものは何の意味もありませんでした。あなたに個人的にお仕えできる機会に比べれば、どんな代償も塵に等しいのです」
languages.original_text: "Confessor Cecilia, your most devoted servant. My parents threw me into a monastery for showing interest in knowledge that the ignorant see as forbidden. But when you came to power, I knew things were about to change. I prayed to you, and you answered when you sent your people to search for a truly pious soul. They tested me, but it was nothing, for any price is dust compared to the chance to serve you personally."

traits.locale_text: 「セシリア司祭、あなたの最も敬虔な従者です。無知な者が禁忌とする知識に興味を示したことで、両親は私を修道院に入れました。ですがあなたが権力を握られた時、情勢が変わろうとしていると知りました。私はあなたに祈り、そしてあなたは真に敬虔な魂を探すべく部下を派遣する形で応えてくださいました。彼らは私を試しましたが、そんなものは何の意味もありませんでした。あなたに個人的にお仕えできる機会に比べれば、どんな代償も塵に等しいのです」

languages.text: “我是告解神父塞西莉亚，您最最忠诚的仆人。我对某些知识表现出了浓厚的兴趣，而无知之人将那些知识视为禁忌之物，于是我的父母便把我丢进了修道院。不过，当您到来的时候，我意识到一切都会不再相同。我向您祈祷，而您答复了我，让您的人找到了真正虔诚的灵魂。我经历过无数考验，但那一切根本算不上什么。因为，只要能亲自侍奉您，为此付出的一切代价都微不足道。”
languages.original_text: "Confessor Cecilia, your most devoted servant. My parents threw me into a monastery for showing interest in knowledge that the ignorant see as forbidden. But when you came to power, I knew things were about to change. I prayed to you, and you answered when you sent your people to search for a truly pious soul. They tested me, but it was nothing, for any price is dust compared to the chance to serve you personally."

traits.locale_text: “我是塞西莉亚牧师，您最最忠诚的仆人。我的父母把我扔进了修道院，因为我对某些知识表现出了兴趣，而无知之人认为那些知识应视为禁忌。不过，当您到来的时候，我就意识到一切都会发生变化。我向您祈祷，而您答复了我，让您的人找到了真正虔诚的灵魂。我经历过无数考验，但那一切根本算不上什么。因为，只要能亲自侍奉您，为此付出的一切代价都微不足道。”

languages.text: "Ben sizin en adanmış hizmetkârınız Günah Çıkarıcı Cecilia. Ebeveynlerim, cahillerin yasaklı olarak gördüğü irfana ilgim olduğunu görünce beni bir manastıra atıvermişti. Ancak başa siz geçtikten sonra bir şeylerin değişeceğini biliyordum. Size dua ettim ve siz de gerçekten inançlı bir ruh bulmaları için emrinizdekileri göndererek bu duama yanıt verdiniz. Beni sınadılar ancak hiç önemli değildi. Ödenebilecek bütün bedeller, size bizzat hizmet etme şansının yanında yalnızca tozla kıyaslanabilir."
languages.original_text: "Confessor Cecilia, your most devoted servant. My parents threw me into a monastery for showing interest in knowledge that the ignorant see as forbidden. But when you came to power, I knew things were about to change. I prayed to you, and you answered when you sent your people to search for a truly pious soul. They tested me, but it was nothing, for any price is dust compared to the chance to serve you personally."
